Slime Laboratory available as a Chrome Extension and can also be played for free on the website https://unblockedgames6x.org/.

Slime Laboratory is a physics-based platform game where players embark on a slimy journey through a mysterious laboratory. The objective is to avoid traps and hazards, squeeze through gaps, stick on hard surfaces, and climb high platforms to reach the checkered finish safely. Along the way, players can collect various floppy disks, including red ones worth 500 points, blue ones worth 200 points, and black ones worth 100 points. The game features a total of fifteen challenging levels, testing players' platforming skills and dexterity as they navigate the sticky, slime-filled environment. Slime Laboratory is available to play for free at the website https://unblockedgames6x.org/.
